sentences.en: All flashed indignant or appealing glances at the inexorable Davis.
sentences.cn: 大家都把愤怒、哀求的目光投向冷酷无情的戴维.

sentences.en: Certain sombre facts emerge , solid , inexorable, like the shapes of mountains from drifting mist.
sentences.cn: 某些令人担忧的 、 但确实无疑的事实已逐渐出现, 好象山峰从飘浮的云雾中逐渐显露出来似的.

sentences.en: Cynthia was inexorable; she would have none of him.
sentences.cn: 辛西娅很坚决; 她绝不接受他.

sentences.en: Development of nontoxic antifouling paint is an inexorable trend of antifouling paint.
sentences.cn: 无毒防污涂料是防污涂料发展的必然趋势.

sentences.en: Diana River had designated her brother inexorable as death.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜·里弗斯说她哥哥家死神一样无情.

sentences.en: Green manufacturing is the inexorable selection of achieving sustainable development.
sentences.cn: 摘要绿色制造是实现可待续发展的必然选择.
他在冷酷的事实面前低了头.
他提出一个无情的要求。

sentences.en: His own career continues its inexorable ascent.
sentences.cn: 他事业的上升势头锐不可当。

sentences.en: In its quiet way , mass advertising has been deadly and inexorable.
sentences.cn: 大宗广告暗中执掌着生杀大权, 并且是毫不留情的.

sentences.en: Mayor Orden, you know our orders are inexorable.
sentences.cn: 奥顿市长, 你知道我们的命令是不可抗拒的.

sentences.en: Russia's final hour, It'seemed, approached with inexorable certainty.
sentences.cn: 看起来俄国的末日确实是无情地来临了.

sentences.en: The development of digital media is inexorable.
sentences.cn: 数字媒体的发展势如破竹.

sentences.en: the inexorable decline of Britain’s manufacturing industry
sentences.cn: 英国制造业无可挽回的衰落

sentences.en: the seemingly inexorable rise in crime
sentences.cn: 似乎无法遏止的犯罪率上升势头

sentences.en: The strangest of all, to him, was the hatred , the brutal, unclocked, inexorable hatred.
sentences.cn: 最叫他觉得奇怪的是那种怨恨, 蛮横残忍的,毫不掩饰的, 置之死地而后快的怨恨.

sentences.en: You would think him gentle, yet in some things he is inexorable as death.
sentences.cn: 你会以为他温和, 然而在有些事情上,他象死神一样无情.

words.tran_cn: 无情的；不屈不挠的；不可阻挡的；无法改变的

trans.tran_cn: 无情的，铁面无私的，不可动摇的，不屈不挠的，不能变更的，不可阻挡的
trans.tran_en: an inexorable process cannot be stopped
